mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recordtable (rid, uid, rdate, scrMood, memo) VALUES(#{rid}, #{uid}, #{rdate}, #{scrMood}, #{memo})
mapper.update: UPDATE recordtable SET scrF1=#{scrF1}, scrF2=#{scrF2}, scrF3=#{scrF3}, scrF4=#{scrF4} WHERE rid= #{rid}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM recordtable WHERE rid=#{rid}) AS SUCCESS
